sen.j: 花見小路通（はなみこうじどおり）は、京都市の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Hanamikoji-doori street is one of the streets running from east to west in Kyoto City.
Hanamikoji-doori street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
Hanamikoji-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 北は三条通から南は安井北門通まで約1km、祇園の中心を通るメインストリートである。
sen.e: Hanamikoji-doori street spans over the length of about 1 km from Sanjo-doori street at its north end to Yasuikita-doori street at its south end, and is the main street passing through the central zone of Gion.

Hanamikoji-doori street spans a length of about 1 km from Sanjo-doori street at its north end to Yasuikita-doori street at its south end, and is the main street passing through the central zone of Gion.

Hanamikoji-dori Street spans a length of about 1 km from Sanjo-dori Street at its north end to Yasui Kitamon-dori Street at its south end, and is the main street passing through the central zone of Gion.
sen.cmt: Hanamikoji-dori Street, Sanjo-dori Streetとし、Yasuikita-doori street→Yasui Kitamon-dori Streetに修正

sen.j: 四条通以南は明治以降発展し、茶屋や料理屋が立ち並ぶ。
sen.e: The section of Hanamikoji-doori street in the south of a point on Shijo-doori street started to develop in Meiji period and tea rooms and restaurants line the road.
The section of Hanamikoji-doori street south of Shijo-doori street started to develop during the Meiji period with tea rooms and restaurants lining the road.
The section of Hanamikoji-dori Street south of Shijo-dori Street started to develop during the Meiji period with tea rooms and restaurants lining the road.

sen.cmt: templeの頭文字を大文字にしました。
